name: HelpI'mStressed
0:
”Alexa, open help i'm stressed”
”Alexa, start help i'm stressed”
”Alexa, launch help i'm stressed”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: help i'm stressed
des:
Are you stressed? This Help I'm Stressed skill provides stress advice with relaxing music to respond to the stress in your life. Get different advice each time you visit the skill. You can get multiple advice sessions daily with multiple visits just by saying "Alexa, Help I'm Stressed" after each advice session.

Stress is fast becoming the biggest health problem in modern societies. Financial pressures, work pressures, family pressures – so much to do so little time to do it all! These are quick ways to ease the pressure and relieve stress.

The information contained in this skill is designed for educational purposes only. It should not be used as, in place of or in conjunction with professional medical advice regarding a treatment or cure for stress. For additional information, a diagnosis and/or treatment advice, consult a licensed physician.

Disclaimer: There are many advice sessions but they are not unlimited. New advice sessions are being added regularly for members.

Important: If you find the stress advice session helpful, please leave a review. Thank you.

If you have any questions about the I'm Stressed skill, email us at stresscoachskill@gmail.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
